Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 5 Attack: Occult: +12 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 22 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Color Spray (O1 Ill): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd and blinded for 1 min)
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Darkness (O2 Evo): (3) R120' 20' burst suppresses natural light and magical light of equal or lesser level for 1 min (heightened 4th conceals targets within the darkness from creatures with darkvision)
Daze (OC1 Enc): (2) R60' Inflicts 5 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Detect Magic (OC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Humanoid Form (O2 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Inspire Defense (OC2 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, plus resistance of half the spell level to physical damage, for 1 rd
Invisibility Sphere (O3 Ill): (2) 10' emanation makes creatures within invisible for 10 min or until any affected performs a hostile act (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Know Direction (OC1 Div): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Light (OC1 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Loremaster's Etude (O1 Foc Div): (F) R30' Target can take the better of 2 rolls on the triggering Recall Knowledge check
Mending (O1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Restoration (O2 Nec): (1 min) Gives a 2-step reduction to a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition, a 1-step reduction to 2 of these conditions, or a 1-stage reduction to a toxin affecting touched (heightened 4th allows reducing a drained condition, lessening a toxin by 2 stages, or reducing a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th allows reducing a permanent doomed condition by 1)
Secret Page (O3 Ill): (1 min) Makes the text on a touched page appear as different text unless a specified password is spoken
Shield (OC1 Abj): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class until the start of the next turn and can end the spell and not use it again for 10 min to use Shield Block with Hardness 5 (heightened 3rd gives Hardness 10; 5th gives Hardness 15; 7th gives Hardness 20; 9th gives Hardness 25)
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 Hit Points
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Inspire Defense: Knows the Inspire Defense occult cantrip
Loremaster's Etude: Knows the Loremaster's Etude occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Polymath Muse: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Esoteric Polymath: Can prepare 1 spell from spellbook during daily prep, treating it as an additional signature spell if it is in repertoire
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
